activated_time.description: The time stamp e911 was provisioned

caller_name.description: The name that will show to emergency services

extended_address.description: The suit/floor/apt. address where the number is in service

latitude.description: The e911 provisioning system calculated service address latitude

house_number.description: The name that will show to emergency services

predirectional.description: The name that will show to emergency services

streetname.description: The name that will show to emergency services

suite.description: The name that will show to emergency services

locality.description: The locality (city) where the number is in service

location_id.description: The e911 provisioning system internal id for this service address

longitude.description: The e911 provisioning system calculated service address longitude

plus_four.description: The extended zip/postal code where the number is in service

postal_code.description: The zip/postal code where the number is in service

region.description: The region (state) where the number is in service

status.description: The e911 provisioning system status for this service address

street_address.description: The street address where the number is in service

porting.description: Porting (in) information for the phone number

billing_account_id.description: The account id the losing carrier has on file

billing_extended_address.description: The suit/floor/apt. address the losing carrier has on file

billing_locality.description: The locality (city) the losing carrier has on file

billing_name.description: The name or company name the losing carrier has on file

billing_postal_code.description: The zip/postal code the losing carrier has on file

billing_region.description: The region (state) the losing carrier has on file

billing_street_address.description: The street address the losing carrier has on file

billing_telephone_number.description: The BTN of the account the number belongs to

customer_contact.description: The phone number that can be used to contact the owner of the number

port_id.description: The id of the port request

service_provider.description: The name of the losing carrier
